head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ARONSON, EVA BEER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ARONSON, EVA BEER

block.p: ARONSON-Eva Beer. On August 14, 2000. Beloved wife of Herbert, and adoring mother and motherin-law of Richard, Emary, and Lisa. Born in Vienna, she was a true New Yorker, devoted to students and colleagues at Interboro Institute. Services at Stephen Wise Free Synagogue, 30 W. 68 St, New York on August 17 at 1PM. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to Robin Hood Foundation, 111 Broadway, New York, N.Y. 10006.
